author: Bill Hutchinson
title: 'Lot of fear': Coronavirus pandemic compounds dire situation for poor Americans
description: 140 million Americans who are considered poor or low-wealth and could not afford a $400 economic emergency.
content:
By 8 a.m. on Wednesday, the line outside St. Paul and St. Andrew United Methodist Church in New York City stretched around the block.
But this wasn't any ordinary morning.
FIxed-income residents like 66-year-old Patricia Sylvester faced an agonizing choice … [+7580 chars]
